verses.verse: And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> made Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> his youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his stead: <S%H8478><s%> for the band <S%H1416><s%> of men that came <S%H935><s%> with the Arabians <S%H6163><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> had slain <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the oldest. <S%H7223><s%> So Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> reigned. <S%H4427><s%>
